short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safe Kids AI Extension Monitors Email for Toxic Language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safe Kids for Email protects Gmail accounts from hate, bullying, and negative language. We highlight messages that might be harmful using machine learning. Additionally, when kids write an unkind email, we pause and have them reflect on their choices to allow them to make better decisions. This extension runs locally on the browser without compromising privacy.
